definitions.text: a member of an irregular armed force that fights a stronger force by sabotage and harassment
merchandise that has imperfections; usually sold at a reduced price without the brand name
contrary to rule or accepted order or general practice
(used of the military) not belonging to or engaged in by regular army forces
(of solids) not having clear dimensions that can be measured; volume must be determined with the principle of liquid displacement
deviating from normal expectations; somewhat odd, strange, or abnormal
examples: these days large families are atypical

definitions.text: (of a surface or shape); not level or flat or symmetrical
examples: walking was difficult on the irregular cobblestoned surface
she led a somewhat irregular private life
